name: Project Soybob
description:
An ancient deity has chosen you to be its chosen servant in exchange for a great reward! But take heed not to displease it for the consequences might be severe and include smiting down with great vengeance!

FEATURES:

  • GRAPHICS
  • GAMEPLAY
  • 2 DISTINCT ENDINGS

What reviews have to say:

  • "I give this a Shinji crying in a ball pit out of 10" - Random Internet Person
